A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film was terrible. Even if we ignore the SJW propaganda that infests every minute of the film\, the characters were awful and the plot was filled with holes. Nothing about this film even felt like Star Wars (aliens in tuxedos gambling at a galactic Foxwood's??)\nEven Jar Jar would be ashamed to associate with such a hot piece of trash that is The Last Jedi.
